features.title: Learn about DIDComm
features.text: Read how to control your security and privacy â€” over the web, email, push notifications, QR codes, BLE, NFC, message queues, sneaker net... Find libraries or connect with DIDComm's authors.

features.title: Build a protocol
features.text: Application-level decentralized protocols are built atop DIDComm. These support activities like secure chat, verifiable credential exchange, buying and selling, scheduling, escrow, bidding, ticketing, and so forth.

features.title: Share a protocol
features.text: To register or modify a protocol definition, follow the instructions and submit a PR against the /site/content/protocols folder of the repo.
